content: nothing signals the beginning of spring like sweet new baby animals they are so cute and make the most darling little noises this little chick is a little shy so you ll have to listen to him closely to hear him chirp he s a little softie once he warms up to you though and is the perfect size for sitting in the crook of your arm as you make him some other little crochet friends for him to play with this pattern was tested using a variety of yarns if you encounter any problems while completing this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me through ravelry instagram or facebook happy crocheting
